name: Rankai
headline: Building AI Agents to replace Marketing Agencies
description:
Marketing agencies are expensive and human-powered. Rankai is building AI agents to replace them. 

Our first AI agent automates the entire SEO process and makes it 20x more affordable.

founders.name: Dyllan Liu, Co-Founder and CEO
founders.description:
Co-Founder and CEO of Rankai.

Previously: Ex-McKinsey, Engineering @ Amazon, ML Research @ Stanford, Business & Data Science @ Berkeley, Online education platform serving 20 schools and 1500+ rural students

founders.name: Hugo (Kanghong) Zhan, Co-Founder, CTO
founders.description:
Co-Founder and CTO @ Rankai.
Previously: Engineering @ Amazon, National Junior Math Olympiad team, 74th nationally ranked table tennis player (U15), CS at UC Berkeley.

# Rankai AI Marketing Agency
|
Run SEO
GO

## Rankai Features
### Auto-Applied Technical SEO Fixes
### AI-Powered Keyword Research
### Scalable SEO Content by AI
Rankai aligns your site with technical SEO best practices to ensure your site is search-engine-friendly, improving overall ranking potential.
![Dashboard view for Auto-Applied Technical SEO Fixes](https://rankai.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ffeatures%2Fcodechange.png&w=1920&q=75)
#### Automated Technical SEO Fixes
Rankai applies thousands of technical SEO fixes to your site, without you having to do anything.
#### Ready to Scale
Rankai scans through 100 pages of your site before suggesting Technical SEO Fixes
#### You Have Control
Enable, disable, and override any changes directly in our dashboard.
#### Latest AI Models
Rankai is always powered by the latest AI models, updating whenever a new model is released.
## Explore Rankai Plans
MonthlyAnnualSave 25%
Early Access Pricing
As one of our early users, you’re unlocking exclusive beta pricing – a fraction of what we’ll charge post-launch. In return, we’d love your feedback to help us shape Rankai into the best it can be. As a thank-you, you’ll also secure priority discounts when we officially launch.
Early Access
Early Access Plan
$39.99
per month
  * Site Audit based on google guideline 
  * Technical SEO fixes applied to site 
  * Automatic keyword research 
  * Five SEO blog posts every week 
  * CMS integration (Auto posting) 


[Join Waitlist](https://rankai.ai/<https:/forms.gle/gXUy9ebkNPTDLG3U9> "Join Waitlist")
Early Access
Full-Service Plan
Custom Pricing
  * Everything in Early Access Plan 
  * Dedicated SEO Expert for personalized guidance and oversight 
  * Monthly Strategy Planning tailored to your site's growth needs 
  * 24/7 Support 


[Join Waitlist](https://rankai.ai/<https:/forms.gle/gXUy9ebkNPTDLG3U9> "Join Waitlist")
FAQ
Frequently Asked Questions
  * How is Rankai able to apply technical SEO fixes to my site?
We add a small script tag to your site's HTML, which lets us make SEO changes directly to your site in real-time. This script handles all the updates automatically, like optimizing meta tags and titles, without you having to do anything. It's safe and doesn't interfere with how your site looks.”
  * Can I approve the technical SEO fixes before they are applied to my site?
Yes! In the dashboard, you'd be able to edit and overide any suggested changes, and you can disable any changes you don't want.
  * How are Rankai generated blogs different from other AI blogs and the results of GPT?
Rankai's blog engine mimics the workflow of an experienced human writer. Our AI crawls your site and selects topics, identifies relevant sources from research, creates detailed outlines, sources relevant information for each section, and chooses appropriate images and visuals for the final content.
  * How do I get Rankai running on my site?
Rankai works on all your site providers (i.e. wordpress, shopify...) as well as custom built sites. We provide a quick 2-minutes setup guide, and if there's any difficulties our team will help you setup via a video call.
  * I have another question
Contact us at admin@rankai.ai!

generated_description:
**Rankai Overview**

Welcome to Rankai, a fresh entry in the AI landscape, launched in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23. This San Francisco-based startup is on a mission: to replace traditional marketing agencies with AI agents that provide smarter, more affordable solutions.

**Mission & Goals**

Rankai's core belief is that marketing agencies, while often effective, are expensive and heavily reliant on human effort. By harnessing the power of AI, Rankai aims to automate the majority of marketing tasks, primarily focusing on SEO. Their first AI agent promises to make the entire SEO process up to 20 times more affordable compared to conventional methods.

**What Rankai Offers**

Their primary offering revolves around automated SEO services. Here’s what they bring to the table:

- **Auto-Applied Technical SEO Fixes**: Rankai’s AI scans websites and autonomously applies thousands of technical SEO fixes to optimize compliance with search engine best practices.
- **AI-Powered Keyword Research**: This feature streamlines the identification of keywords crucial for improving search visibility.
- **Scalable SEO Content Creation**: Rankai generates high-quality, SEO-optimized blog posts, effectively mimicking the workflow of experienced human writers.

**Pricing Plans**

Rankai has introduced an Early Access Pricing plan at just $39.99 per month. This plan includes:

- Comprehensive site audits based on Google guidelines,
- Automated technical SEO fixes and keyword research,
- Five SEO blog posts each week,
- CMS integration for automatic posting.

In addition, they offer a Full-Service Plan that provides personalized guidance from a dedicated SEO expert for sites needing more tailored attention.

**Team and Support**

With a small but dedicated team of three, Rankai operates under the guidance of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. Their approach prioritizes customer input, actively seeking feedback from early users to refine their product. You can get in touch with them via their friendly support at admin@rankai.ai.

**In Conclusion**

Rankai is positioned as a game-changer in the marketing domain, leveraging cutting-edge AI to automate processes that have traditionally been cumbersome and costly. Their focus on affordability and efficiency could very well redefine how businesses approach marketing strategies. If you're interested in joining their journey toward making marketing accessible and automated, consider signing up for their waitlist today! 

Check out their website for more details: [Rankai](https://rankai.ai/).
